TextView.android:text: You can keep track of your Customers ans Suppliers. Fill in their data manually. To add a Customer you have to click on the add button then enter the customer information and click on the save button, the email and the customer id should be unique.

In order the update a customer data. First click on the customer that you want to update then a dialog box appeares and it contains the customer data then modify the customer data and click on the update Button
To delete a customer from the list. You must long press the item you want to delete, then confirm the deletion by selecting the Yes option.
